body:
Oh, understand now : ) But really its not look like menu on device. Its show without scroll / rollup on device. Just blink. And i think it is another page with static menu is loaded.
I think auto hide after choose will be enough (and hide if menu width is > 50% of description text width only). Thank you. I already finish with tour, but maybe sombody else will not confuse like me again. : )
